channel.title: 2026 North American Annual Meeting of the Association for Symbolic Logic on ASL North American Meeting 2026
channel.description: Recent content in 2026 North American Annual Meeting of the Association for Symbolic Logic on ASL North American Meeting 2026

item.title: Hotel & Travel
item.description:
The conference will take place at UPenn’s Carey Law School, in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

Travel

Ground Transportation

The conference location is located only a 15 minute walk from 30th Street Station (Philadelphia’s main train station), making Amtrak a convenient way to get to campus from around the Northeast US. Note that Northeast Amtrak trains tend to increase considerably in price in the few weeks before travel, so remember to book ahead.

The L subway line and T trolleys provide a quick trip into Center City, including to the Convention Center hosting the ICM.
